code: import*as types from'./../constants/ActionTypes';export var listAll=function listAll(){return{type:types.LIST_ALL};};export var AddProduct=function AddProduct(Product){return{type:types.Add_Product,Product:Product};};export var toggleForm=function toggleForm(){return{type:types.Toggle_Form};};export var openForm=function openForm(){return{type:types.Open_Form};};export var closeForm=function closeForm(){return{type:types.Close_Form};};export var deleteProduct=function deleteProduct(id){return{type:types.Delete_Product,ID:id};};export var editProduct=function editProduct(Product){return{type:types.Edit_Product,Product:Product};};export var addProduct=function addProduct(Product){return{type:types.Add_Product,Product:Product};};export var searchProduct=function searchProduct(keySearch){return{type:types.Search_Product,keySearch:keySearch};};
